data.DescriptionHtml:
You channel mischievous divine energy to envelop your foe in sickened disorientation.
This spell makes the world appear to be tossing and rippling in a nauseating manner.
The subject is sickened for the duration of the spell and must make a Fortitude save or be nauseated.
This saving throw must be repeated each round.
data.Name: Bewildering Visions
